casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Elkins, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Elkins (1995), 74 Ohio St.3d 9.]

*10(No. 94-2086 Submitted July 26, 1995 Decided October 25, 1995.) Ronald Dale Elkins, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the decision of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in its opinion.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
